channel.title: Alireza Baloochi

item.title: My trip to Sri Lanka (hw)
item.description: Wenn ich 13 jahre war, gehe ich nach Sri Lanka mit meiner familie für eine woche. Sri Lanka ist ein kurzes Landund liegt in Asia, unter Indien. Es ist ein grünes Land, mit viele Baume und Tiere. Am anfang, waren wir in Colombo, die Hauptstadt. Es war sehr bevölkert. Ich muss sagen: So ein Auslandsaufenthalt ist in meinem Augen eine große Bereichung. Die srilankische Menschen sind sehr freundlich und zufrieden.

item.title: Google Code-in
item.description: The Journey It goes back all the way in November when Fedora Project tweeted that they need some Mentors for Google Code-in. Initially I didn’t knew what it was but after a simple search it was clear that it was a competition ran by Google. So Google provided all the backend and platform for open source organizations, which mentors of each org then creates tasks in the system, which then the student solves.

item.title: Robocup Asia-Pacific @ Dubai
item.description: In December 1st we were told by our CS teacher that there will be a Robocup held in Dubai, I was really intrested and since the material they introduced was mostly graphical with some Arduino code in it, I decided to join although I had limited experience in both of these subjects. The school created a workshop + election process at friday, which consisted of using the code to run virtual robots in an area, which was powered by Microsoft Robotics suit and Nvidia PhysX.

item.title: About
item.description: My Full CV: Curriculum Vitae Works: Mentor at Google Code-in 2019 System Administrator at Tehran Internet Co. Exhibitor at Dubai Knowledge and Human Development Authority Ranked 5th in the National Cyber Olympiad Fedora Project Contributor Certified Online Tutor and E-lecture Designer by HBMSU Intrests: Swimming & biking Writing (Essay, Documentation) Coding & Designing Photography Languages: Persian (Native) English (Fluent) Arabic (familiar) German (Familiar) You can find more info about me in my Linkedin, I post updates there.
